title: Xi'an lockdown brings heartbreak and dysfunction as political pressure to contain outbreak grows
content:
1. Xi'an lockdown brings heartbreak and dysfunction as political pressure to contain outbreak grows  CNN
  2. Tales of anguish emerge from China's locked-down Xian, as hospital staffers are fired over woman's treatment  The Washington Post
  3. Residents of Xi'an, China, react to COVID lockdowns with outrage and humor  NPR
  4. China's Henan imposes more COVID curbs as cases spike, though numbers small  Reuters
  5. China’s Henan imposes new restrictions as COVID cases spike: Live  Al Jazeera English
